EmailTemplate.subject: Phone Call Follow Up - {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} {!Opportunity.Program_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
I am following up regarding our recent conversation today. I wanted to provide you with some additional information and the link to your candidate evaluation from.
You have been identified as a candidate for the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} {!Opportunity.Program_Name__c} award! An exclusive group of {!Opportunity.Profession_Type__c} will receive the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} award and be featured in a special {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Issue_s__c} of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}.
As a candidate, we need additional information in order to evaluate you based on our eligibility and evaluation criteria, to move you forward in the research process.
To submit your information, please go to the secure online link below and complete the form questionnaire. This only takes a few minutes of your time to complete.
Candidate Evaluation Form - Click Here to Complete.
The deadline for submission is end of day {!Opportunity.ACDF_Deadline__c}.
Evaluation Process: Candidates will be evaluated on criteria aligned with providing quality service and professional excellence. Only those candidates who differentiate themselves based on the criteria will be named a {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} {!Opportunity.Program_Name__c} recipients. For more information about the research driving the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} award, please review the Five Star Professional - Research Overview.
Award winners are scheduled to be notified 4-6 weeks after the deadline date posted above.
For questions or assistance with your candidate evaluation form, please feel free to give me a call at {!User.Phone} or you can email me with any questions that you may have.
Kind Regards,
{!User.Name} Research Representative
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway, Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} http://www.fivestarprofessional.com
We exist to define and promote professional excellence.
Reminder: Third party firms may have contacted you suggesting you are an award winner and offering you wall plaques or other products. These firms are in no way affiliated with Five Star Professional.
Only Five Star Professional can name you a Five Star award winner and provide official award-related products and services. Marketing organizations not affiliated with Five Star Professional do not comply with industry regulatory requirements and may be violating trademarks or copyrights.
